trans-unit.source: Simultaneously updates the position and size of one or more windows in a single screen-refreshing cycle

seg-source.mrk: Simultaneously updates the position and size of one or more windows in a single screen-refreshing cycle

target.mrk: Simultaneously updates the position and size of one or more windows in a single screen-refreshing cycle

trans-unit.source: Handle to a multiple-window-position structure that contains size and position information for one or more windows.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a multiple-window-position structure that contains size and position information for one or more windows.

target.mrk: Handle to a multiple-window-position structure that contains size and position information for one or more windows.

trans-unit.source: This internal structure is returned by the _WinAPI_BeginDeferWindowPos() function or by the most recent call to the _WinAPI_DeferWindowPos() function.

seg-source.mrk: This internal structure is returned by the _WinAPI_BeginDeferWindowPos() function or by the most recent call to the _WinAPI_DeferWindowPos() function.

target.mrk: This internal structure is returned by the _WinAPI_BeginDeferWindowPos() function or by the most recent call to the _WinAPI_DeferWindowPos() function.

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_EndDeferWindowPos() function sends the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING and WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGED messages to each window identified in the internal structure.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_EndDeferWindowPos() function sends the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING and WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGED messages to each window identified in the internal structure.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_EndDeferWindowPos() function sends the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING and WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGED messages to each window identified in the internal structure.
